name: [LD34] Jared and the Corn Nuts
description:
This is my Entry for the Ludum Dare 34. http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

It is a rag-doll/physics game where you control the players feet using two buttons. Try to collect as many corn nuts as possible without falling between the mattresses!

I put a total of about 7 hours into this project. Including code, graphics, and audio (Not the music)

Be sure to press all the fullscreen buttons in the bottom right corner if your playing online!
